## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **install packages**

    Navigate into siteâ€™s directory and run the following:

    ```shell
     npm install gatsby
     npm install
    ```

2.  **run**

    to run the website locally, run the following command in the website directory: 

    ```shell
      gatsby develop
    ```
    this will run the website locally on at `http://localhost:8000`


This website is also hosted on AWS amplify and you can directly check it out through this link:
      https://master.d2u9ivzybw58qd.amplifyapp.com/
